Consultant/contractor rate information sheet
Consultant expenses and contracts include goods or services that directly contribute to the implementation or
enhancement of the project. The use of a consultant should be more economical than direct employment. Compensation for individual consultant services procured under a COPS Office award must be reasonable and
allocable in accordance with Office of Management and Budget (OMB) cost principles and consistent with that
paid for similar services in the marketplace.
